verses.roman:
rātre pralāpa kare svarūpera kaṇṭha dhari'
āveśe āpana bhāva kahaye ughāḍi'

synonyms: rātre—at night; pralāpa—delirium; kare—does; svarūpera—of Svarūpa Dāmodara; kaṇṭha dhari'-embracing the neck; āveśe—in ecstasy; āpana—His own; bhāva—mood; kahaye—speaks; ughāḍi'-exuberantly.
translation: At night He talked incoherently in grief with His arms around Svarūpa Dāmodara's neck. He spoke out His heart in ecstatic inspiration.
